  • Classes in es.ulpgc.eii.spool used by es.ulpgc.eii.spool
    Class
    Description
    Event
    Base contract for all events handled by the spool-crawler framework.
    EventBuffer
    A thread-safe, in-memory buffer that accumulates events from a crawler strategy and delivers them as a Stream on demand.
    EventCategory
    Classifies an Event according to its origin and semantic scope within the spool-crawler framework.
    SchemaVersion
    A validated value object representing the semantic version of an event's payload schema.
